bash-4.1$ spack extensions python@3.5.1

    return_val = command(parser, args)
  File "/nfs/tmp2/lee218/pkg/spack/lib/spack/spack/cmd/extensions.py", line 77, in extensions
    extensions = spack.repo.extensions_for(spec)
AttributeError: 'RepoPath' object has no attribute 'extensions_for'
title: error in spack extensions
